channel.title: Deltascape questions
channel.description:
Ok, so me and a few friends of mine wanted to have a pk tournament cause were all fighting over which type of pker is better.
So, i planned on editing a deltascape source to make lving go super fast. But the problem is that its like coded different, i have read a good amount of tutorials on this and none seem to match up with delta's codes :/
i have searched for like hitDiff and such, but nothing, and even when i have found the hitDiff, i change the exp from like 100 to 1000, but i still get the same amount of exp.
lol its a newb question i know, but don't flam about it, you will be reported.
msn: redeyeballs38@yahoo.com
any help would awesome :p

item.title: Deltascape questions
item.dc:creator: @GodsChaos GodsChaos
item.description:
@GodsChaos wrote:

yeah, but, i just wanted to know this so when i do getting into editing, if i wanted to change the rates, i could.

Read full topic

item.title: Deltascape questions
item.dc:creator: @LeechYourStuffPlease LeechYourStuffPlease
item.description:
@LeechYourStuffPlease wrote:

Why not make yourself owner and type ::master rofl[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 08, 2008, 09:35:41 pm[/size][hr]Or Just give yourself 99 stats Lol.

item.title: Deltascape questions
item.dc:creator: @Ibehustlin247 Ibehustlin247
item.description:
@Ibehustlin247 wrote:

Look for TotalExp, you’ll find serveral amounts of experience either saying 150 or 50, change them to whatever you want your exp rate to be…

Read full topic

item.title: Deltascape questions
item.dc:creator: @GodsChaos GodsChaos
item.description:
@GodsChaos wrote:

no no, its just for a few days so my and my friends can settle this little arguement we have going.
not gonna keep it that high lol, that’s dumb.

But after this, im gonna change back. and i only chose deltascape because i know it has good pking

Read full topic

item.description:
